about.title: About Me
about.introduction: Hello! I'm Lucas Banheti, recently graduated in Systems Analysis and Development from UniCesumar. Professional with a solid foundation in programming logic, web development and databases. I have good learning ability, responsibility and willingness to face challenges. I seek to start my career in technology as a junior developer or intern, applying the knowledge acquired in graduation and practical web development courses.

education.title: Education
education.degree: Technologist in Systems Analysis and Development

services.title: What can I do for your project?
items: Development of responsive and modern websites that highlight your products or services.
Creation of customized web applications, with integrated Front-End and Back-End.
Optimization and deployment on platforms like Netlify and Vercel, ensuring performance and stability.
Structuring efficient systems using Node.js, SQL, ReactJS and NextJS.
Organized documentation and clear communication, facilitating teamwork and future maintenance.

whyChoose.title: Why choose to work with me?
items: Total commitment: I deliver what I promise, studying and applying effective solutions.
Quick and constant learning: I'm always updated on the latest technologies, offering modern and efficient solutions.
Results-focused: Before coding, I analyze and deeply understand the problem, ensuring the solution meets your exact needs.

skills.title: My technical skills:
skills.frontendTechs: HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript | Bootstrap | jQuery | ReactJS | NextJS | Tailwind CSS | TypeScript
skills.backendTechs: PHP | Node.js | MySQL | TypeScript | AJAX | Git | GitHub

cta.title: Want to know more about my journey?
cta.description: If you identify with my path and are looking for a committed developer, let's talk about how I can contribute to your project!

timeline.title: Computer Operator – Microlins
timeline.description: Complementary course that marked my first contact with technology and computing, developing basic skills in computer operation.

timeline.title: Web Programming – WMBarros Training
timeline.description: Web Programming course with PHP, HTML and JavaScript + Database, where I had my first contact with web development and programming.

timeline.title: Production Assistant – PROPAL
timeline.description: Worked as Production Assistant at PROPAL – Food Trade, in Ibiporã, developing skills in organization, discipline and teamwork.

timeline.title: Checker – BRF Brasil Foods S.A
timeline.description: Started my career at BRF Brasil Foods S.A as Checker, developing skills in organization, attention to detail and responsibility.

timeline.title: Technologist in Systems Analysis and Development – UniCesumar
timeline.description: Completed my graduation in Systems Analysis and Development at UniCesumar, in Londrina-PR. Learned essential fundamentals: programming logic, algorithms, data structures, web development and databases. Education that gave me a solid foundation to start my career in technology.

timeline.title: Checker II – BRF Brasil Foods S.A
timeline.description: Promoted to Checker II at BRF, taking on greater responsibilities and further developing my organizational and teamwork skills.

timeline.title: Pallet Truck Operator – BRF Brasil Foods S.A
timeline.description: Worked as Pallet Truck Operator at BRF, developing operational skills and maintaining commitment and discipline at work.

timeline.title: Complete Web Developer Course – Udemy
timeline.description: Completed the complete Web Development course on Udemy, learning HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, PHP, MySQL, TypeScript, AJAX and SEO. This course allowed me to deepen my practical knowledge in web development.

timeline.title: Retractable Forklift Operator – BRF Brasil Foods S.A
timeline.description: Currently working as Retractable Forklift Operator at BRF, while seeking my first opportunity in technology as a junior developer or intern, applying the knowledge acquired in graduation and practical courses.
